name: fundamental-ngx
description: Fundamental Library for Angular is a themable Fiori 3 Angular component library.

scripts.build-all: npm run build-artifacts && npm run build-docs -- --configuration production --base-href="/fundamental-ngx/"
scripts.build-docs: npm run compile-typedoc-all && npm run copy-docs && ng build
scripts.build-artifacts: nx build core --with-deps --configuration production && nx build platform --with-deps --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --with-deps --configuration production && nx build docs
scripts.build-deploy-library: nx build core --with-deps --configuration production && nx build platform --with-deps --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --with-deps --configuration production && npm run build:schematics && npm run build:platform-schematics && npm run build:moment-adapter-schematics && npm run sync-versions && cp PLATFORM_README.md dist/libs/platform/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.build-pack-library: nx build core --with-deps --configuration production && nx build platform --with-deps --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --with-deps --configuration production && npm run build:schematics && npm run build:platform-schematics && npm run build:moment-adapter-schematics && npm run sync-versions && cd dist/libs/core/ && npm pack && cd ../platform && npm pack && cd ../moment-adapter && npm pack && cd ../..
scripts.copy-docs: cp README.md apps/docs/src/assets/README.md && cp NEW_COMPONENT.md apps/docs/src/assets/NEW_COMPONENT.md && cp NEW_PLATFORM_COMPONENT.md apps/docs/src/assets/NEW_PLATFORM_COMPONENT.md && npm run copy-app-docs
scripts.copy-app-docs: cp libs/core/src/lib/README.md apps/docs/src/assets/CORE_README.md && cp PLATFORM_README.md apps/docs/src/assets/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.e2e:ci: ng serve --no-watch --aot wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:wdio
scripts.e2e:platform:ci: ng serve --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:wdio:platform
scripts.e2e:core:ci: ng serve --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:wdio:core
scripts.e2e:cron:platformA:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:platformA
scripts.e2e:cron:platformB:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:platformB
scripts.e2e:cron:core:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && npm run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:core
scripts.e2e:a11y: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --no-watch --aot --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 &&  npm run e2e:wdio:a11y
scripts.lint: npm run lint:docs && npm run lint:core && npm run lint:platform && npm run lint:moment-adapter
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && npm run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.compile-typedoc-all: npm run compile-typedoc-core && npm run compile-typedoc-platform && npm run compile-typedoc-moment-adapter
scripts.compile-typedoc-core: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core libs/core/src/lib --tsconfig libs/core/src/lib/tsconfig.lib.json --hideGenerator --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.compile-typedoc-platform: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform libs/platform/src/lib --tsconfig libs/platform/src/lib/tsconfig.lib.json --hideGenerator --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.build:schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/core/tsconfig.schematics.json && npm run copy:schemas && npm run copy:collection
scripts.build:platform-schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/platform/tsconfig.schematics.json && npm run copy:platform-add-schemas && npm run copy:platform-update-schemas && npm run copy:platform-collection && npm run copy:platform-translations && npm run copy:migration-collection
scripts.build:moment-adapter-schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/moment-adapter/tsconfig.schematics.json && npm run copy:moment-adapter-add-schemas && npm run copy:moment-adapter-add-collection
scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points
scripts.docker-test: docker run -u $(id -u) --rm -v "$PWD":/app trion/ng-cli-karma npm run test
